page.title: 01 MASHAM
page.content: The town is situated by the{River Ure} which flows through{Wensleydale, North {Yorkshire. {Population:}c.1000 {Main Feature:}Large market square. {Main Church:}St. Mary's Church C.E. {Main Public Building:}Town Hall. {Main Residential Venue:}King's Head Hotel. {Education:}Masham C.E. Aided Primary School. {Main Employers:}Theakston's Brewery, I'Anson's Mills, The Swinton Estate. {Sporting Facilities:}Large Recreation Ground,Sport's Pavilion,Snooker Club,Nine-hole golf course,Bowling green,Tennis courts,BMX track,Football team, Cricket team, Hockey Team, Badminton proposed squash courts. {Main Event:}The Steam Engine Rally in July.
